Serving All Monmouth County

Serving All of Monmouth County, New Jersey

From the historic streets of Freehold to the coastal communities of Spring Lake,Custom Kitchens & Baths by Lopez brings exceptional craftsmanship and personalized service to every corner of Monmouth County. No matter where you're located, we're committed to transforming your house into your dream home.

Primary Service Areas

These are our most frequently served communities where we've completed hundreds of kitchen and bathroom renovations. Click any location to learn more about our services in your area.

Freehold

07728

The county seat of Monmouth County, Freehold offers a perfect blend of historic charm and modern amenities. Known for its Victorian homes and thriving downtown.

Near: Manalapan, Marlboro→

Colts Neck

07722

An affluent community known for its equestrian estates, luxury homes, and rural character. Popular among professionals seeking upscale country living.

Near: Marlboro, Freehold→

Holmdel

07733

A prestigious township featuring luxury homes, excellent schools, and convenient access to NYC. Home to PNC Bank Arts Center and Bell Labs historic site.

Near: Middletown, Hazlet→

Marlboro

07746, 07751

A family-friendly township with top-rated schools, beautiful neighborhoods, and a strong sense of community. Popular among NYC commuters.

Near: Manalapan, Freehold→

Manalapan

07726

A growing township offering a mix of established neighborhoods and new developments. Known for excellent schools and family-oriented communities.

Near: Marlboro, Freehold→

Middletown

07748, 07701, 07758

One of the oldest townships in NJ with diverse neighborhoods from waterfront communities to suburban developments. Offers easy NYC ferry access.

Near: Red Bank, Holmdel→

Red Bank

07701

A vibrant downtown arts and dining destination on the Navesink River. Known for theaters, restaurants, boutiques, and historic Victorian architecture.

Near: Fair Haven, Little Silver→

Rumson

07760

An exclusive waterfront community known for grand estates, pristine beaches, and prestigious country clubs. One of NJ's wealthiest towns.

Near: Fair Haven, Sea Bright→

Wall Township

07719, 07731, 07753

A diverse township offering beach communities, suburban neighborhoods, and rural areas. Popular for its proximity to beaches and reasonable home prices.

Near: Spring Lake, Sea Girt→

Howell

07731

A large township with diverse housing options from farms to new developments. Known for Manasquan Reservoir and strong community spirit.

Near: Freehold, Wall Township→

Shore Communities

Specializing in coastal home renovations that withstand salt air and moisture while maintaining luxury and style.
